name: CHANNEL_MEDIA_RELAY_EVENT
description: The event code of channel media relay.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_NETWORK_DISCONNECTED: 0: The user disconnects from the server due to a poor network connection.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_NETWORK_CONNECTED: 1: The user is connected to the server.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_JOINED_SRC_CHANNEL: 2: The user joins the source channel.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_JOINED_DEST_CHANNEL: 3: The user joins the destination channel.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_SENT_TO_DEST_CHANNEL: 4: The SDK starts relaying the media stream to the destination channel.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_RECEIVED_VIDEO_FROM_S: 5: The server receives the audio stream from the source channel.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_RECEIVED_AUDIO_FROM_S: 6: The server receives the audio stream from the source channel.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_UPDATE_DEST_CHANNEL_R: 8: The destination channel update fails due to internal reasons.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_UPDATE_DEST_CHANNEL_N: 9: The destination channel does not change, which means that the destination channel fails to be updated.

parameters.RELAY_EVENT_PACKET_UPDATE_DEST_CHANNEL_I: 10: The destination channel name is null.
